critique: The executive order expresses concern about the spread of epidemic cerebrospinal meningitis and aims to prevent its introduction into the United States. The order conveys a sense of fear and urgency due to the potential health risks. It also conveys a sense of disgust due to the nature of the disease. There is no indication of joy or surprise. The order may also convey a sense of sadness due to the potential impact of the disease on public health.
